review: It took me 4 sittings to complete my treatment and everytime Dr Suraj and his staff treated me very patiently. I have seen that he tells his patient what's real rather what will make you feel good to listen. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The problem was related with wisdom tooth and I was very much afraid of going to any doctor just like that without knowing how he or she will treat the it.

But I had to find one because I was suffering a lot due to severe pain and sensitivity.

Well! thankfully I came to know about Dr. Suraj, visited him and in just one sitting, extraction was successfully done and that too without any pain at all.

Dr. Suraj explains well and in detail. He is good natured. He charges reasonable.

Thanks doctor and best of luck :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Dental Cleaning,
review:
I visit Dr Suraj R Suvarna for Dental Filing , Dental Cleaning , RCT and Dental Crown. I am happy to say that the whole team is very efficient , from diagnosing the issue to treatment plan and care , everything was explained in a very efficiently.

Dr Sanjay Patil attended to my RCT and the same was done very smoothly without letting me experience any pain or discomfort during the surgery.

Dr Arpita Jangu did my dental cleaning and dental fillings. She is very efficient, calm and composed and explained to all my queries in a layman language . Thank you so much...

Finally Dr. Suraj R Suvarna fixed my crown. He is very friendly and answered all my queries in a pleasant way.

Thank you Dr Suraj and the entire team. I would definitely recommend the doctor for any Dental issues. The clinic is well maintained and took all precautions even in times of Covid-19.

Regards
Partha Banerjee
reply_text: Thank you so much for the encouraging words. Me and my team appreciate your kind message. It will definitely motivate us to do better. Thanks once again üôè

tags: None
review:
I have had visited Dr. Suraj's clinic multiple times for various dental concerns & my experience has always been very delightful & completely satisfactory.

Highly recommended for painless RCT, Crowning & Dental fillings procedures.  Dr. Suraj Suvarna & Dr. Mehvish Peerzada are extremely courtieus, positive & experienced professionals. Post-treatment instructions were thoroughly explained.

review: I visited Dr. Suraj‚Äôs Clinic because I had extreme tooth pain. He told me to get an rct done as my tooth was infected. I paid for the same and the rct filling came out in less than a month. He cud have mentioned the entire procedure and cost involved in the beginning *** ** ********* **** *** ********* ********** ** **** * ****** *** ** ** ******* Would not recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My wisdom tooth has to be extracted. It has been giving me problems. But some temporary relief I have got after visiting Dr Suraj. He is patient and takes the anxiety away. 
And the ointment he has prescribed has at least helped me eat , after three days of not being able to eat a full meal.
So thank you doctor and I am sure with your guidance, my wisdom tooth extraction would not be all that painful.
